documentation.content: Determines which branch to execute. If true the Then Runnable runs otherwise the Else Runnable runs.

description.content: Runnable to execute when the condition is true.

documentation.content: Defines the runnable that runs if the condition evaluates to true.

description.content: Runnable to execute when the condition is false.

documentation.content: Defines the runnable that runs if the condition evaluates to false.

description.content: Evaluates a condition and executes either the Then Runnable or the Else Runnable.

documentation.content: Evaluates a boolean condition. If true, executes the Then Runnable; otherwise, executes the Else Runnable. Mirrors a standard 'if/else' control structure in programming languages.
